body_html:
The only concern of external contribution of adding RDMA support is whether Google will release its own implementation in the future, which will render external effort less meaningful.

Can we have a member in the TF team confirm that it will not be open sourced, at least not recently?
body_text:
The only concern of external contribution of adding RDMA support is whether Google will release its own implementation in the future, which will render external effort less meaningful.
Can we have a member in the TF team confirm that it will not be open sourced, at least not recently?
body:
The only concern of external contribution of adding RDMA support is whether Google will release its own implementation in the future, which will render external effort less meaningful. 

Can we have a member in the TF team confirm that it will not be open sourced, at least not recently?
